entry.title: TricksterCTF - TryHackMe
entry.summary: An awesome beginner-friendly CTF challenge to test your enumeration skills. Let’s exploit the machine. You can also set up this machine locally on a Virtual Machine. Please find the download link. Reconnaissance: Let’s start by identifying the machine’s IP address using the nmap or netdiscover tool. ➜ nmap -sn 192.168.20.1/24 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-02-28 ...

entry.title: DomeCTF 2021
entry.summary: We Secured 7th Position At DomeCTF as Part of c0c0n 2021 Conference, Conducted by Kerala Police Cyberdome And Beagle Security. Challenges Writeups Brazil - Quick Challenge: quick_703471b249918e8fc14f95ba119bb7af.zip We can see here 5 QR Codes after extracting the given file. Use any online QRreader to get your flag parts. entry.title: Year Of the JellyFish - TryHackMe
entry.summary: Room: https://tryhackme.com/room/yearofthejellyfish This article is about the room Year Of The JellyFish capture the flag created by MuirlandOracle on TryHackMe. This box is part of an OSCP voucher giveaway. The prize is donated by @q8fawazo. Reconnaissance: You will get a specific IP_Address of this machine, let’s start with nmap scan. nmap -sC -sV $IP we can see 80, 443 are open, l...
